pages.text: $(thing)Teleport/$ is the more expensive (in terms of $(l:base_concepts/pressure)air/$ used) version of the $(l:programming/goto)Goto/$ widget, but just as straightforward: the $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ will teleport to the nearest reachable location within the specified $(l:programming/area)Area/$.$(p)The $(item)Drone/$ uses 10000mL air to teleport, which is most of an un-upgraded $(item)Drone's/$ capacity, so $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#volume)Volume Upgrades/$ are recommended.
